text: @ochocinco First of all i'm a big fan of you. I'm a 51 year old out of work landscaper due to the coronavirus. I was with this company for 8 years. I've been building some up some clients but my truck is down. I've yet to receive a stimulus check. Any help will be a blessin from GOD and you
